name: .ACORN File Extension
summary: Learn about .ACORN files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open an ACORN file in Flying Meat Acorn (macOS). To do so, open Acorn and select File → Open.... Then, navigate to and open your ACORN file.
You can use Flying Meat Acorn to convert ACORN files to other image formats, by selecting File → Export → Export (Web & Other).... The formats you can convert to include:
Keep in mind that converting to many of these formats will "flatten" the image your ACORN file contains.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
